page.title: 05Playground Games
page.content: SOME CHILDREN LIKE TO PLAY "MAY,I" AT SCHOOL OR AT HOME."MAY,I" IS A GAME WHICH YOU PLAY LIKE THIS; THE PERSON WHO IS "ON" STANDS ABOUT 2 METRES AWAY FROM THE PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT ON.THE PERSON WHO IS "ON" SAYS TO ONE OF THE CHILDREN "TAKE A LAMP-POST." A LAMP-POST IS WHERE YOU LIE ON THE FLOOR AND STRETCH YOUR HANDS.THEN YOU GET UP AND STAND WHERE YOUR HANDS REACHED BUT FIRST YOU MUST SAY "MAY,I" IF YOU DON'T YOU WILL HAVE TO GO BACK TO THE START.AFTER YOU HAVE HAD YOUR TURN THE PERSON WHO IS "ON" GOES TO THE NEXT PERSON AND TO THE NEXT.THE WINNER IS THE FIRST ONE WHO REACHES THE PERSON WHO IS "ON".THERE ARE OTHER THINGS TO SAY LIKE,"TAKE A BABY STEP" OR "TAKE A GIANT STRIDE." I DO NOT PLAY IT ALL THE TIME AT SCHOOL BUT I LIKE TO PLAY IT AT HOME. SHEILA WOOD.
